post:
Fliphost has been offering hosting solutions for over one year now. Today I am pleased to announce that Fliphost is now offering Storage servers starting at $7.00 a month!

Servers come with a selection of minimal templates, lower ram and high storage. Each server uses RAID5 and is located in Choopa's NJ Data center.


**Storage Plans:**


> **Storage100**

> RAM: 128mb
Cores: 2
Storage: 100Gb (RAID 5)
Bandwidth: 10mbit
Price: $3.50 p/m*
SignUp Link: [HERE](http://sales.fliphost.net/link.php?id=7)



> **Storage250**:

> RAM: 128mb
Cores: 2
Storage: 250Gb (RAID 5)
Bandwidth: 10mbit
Price: $7.00 p/m*
SignUp Link: [HERE](http://sales.fliphost.net/link.php?id=2)






To see the full listing up to 4000GB visit the WHT Ad (Non LEB/LET Prices): [HERE](http://www.webhostingtalk.com/showthread.php?t=1208509
)


Native IPV6 is coming soon!

Virtualization: OpenVZ
Test IP: 108.61.76.74
Location: Choopa, NJ
Panel: SolusVM
Current Stock: About 12TB is Available to start . 

Website : www.fliphost.net
Client Area: https://sales.fliphost.net
Support email: support@fliphost.net

* Limited Time Price, Regular $7.50
